oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various short recordings of songs performed by the Bailes Brothers, Hank Williams, and unidentified
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Short performances of various songs, as performed by the Bailes Brothers, Hank Williams, and unidentified.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams; Red Sovine; Bailes Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) The Bailes Brothers perform "Remember Me (When The Candle Lights Are Gleaming)" [incomplete] / (0:12) [Unidentified] talks [incomplete] / (0:18) Hank Williams performs "Happy Rovin’ Cowboy" [incomplete] / (0:25) [Unidentified] talks and mentions KWKH [incomplete] / (0:42) Red Sovine introduces song [incomplete] / (0:53) Red Sovine performs "Humpty Dumpty Heart" [incomplete] / (1:00) [Unidentified] performs church bell music [incomplete]
